title: Manikyam & Kundan Angel Jhumka - A Divine Duo
features: This exquisite pair of Jhumkas features a unique 'angel wing' design adorned with intricate Kundan work, a hallmark of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The central cabochon emerald (Manikyam) adds a touch of royalty. The Kundan setting is meticulously handcrafted, offering a timeless elegance. Delicate drops featuring smaller Kundan stones enhance the earring's movement and brilliance.
occasions: and special celebrations. Perfect for pairing with traditional silk sarees or lehengas for a regal look. Suitable for both traditional Telugu events like muhurtham or modern Indian weddings.
description: These Jhumkas are a fusion of traditional Kundan artistry and a contemporary design. The vibrant emeralds (Manikyam) are believed to bring prosperity and good fortune, while the Kundan setting provides a timeless elegance. Crafted with high-quality materials and meticulous attention to detail, these earrings are an heirloom piece to be treasured for generations. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster and durability.
